text.section: Except for rentals of property under impartial policies that establish fees for various classes of renters, the Board of Trustees of Prince George's Community College may not lease any property to any private person unless it complies with this section.
The Board of Trustees shall advertise at least 2 weeks before the bids are due in one or more newspapers published in Prince George's County.
The lease shall be awarded to the highest responsible bidder and conform to any qualifications set by the Board of Trustees.
